Msg.show({title:"WE-II Final Project",message:"A REST client of ARSnova visualising the current statistics data of the backend",scope:this,buttons:[{itemId:"yes",text:"OK"}],fn:function(b){if(b=="yes"){}}})}});var data=[];var stop=false;function pad(a){return("0"+a).slice(-2)}function getData(){if(!stop){$.ajax({url:"proxy.php?url=https://arsnova.eu/statistics/",success:function(a){$("#data1").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data2").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data3").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data4").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data5").animate({height:"toggle"});if(data.length>9){data.shift();Ext.getStore("ARSnovaVis").setData(data)}var b=new Date();var c=pad(b.getHours())+":"+pad(b.getMinutes())+":"+pad(b.getSeconds());data.push({time:c,activeUsers:a.contents.activeUsers,openSessions:a.contents.openSessions,closedSessions:a.contents.closedSessions,questions:a.contents.questions,answers:a.contents.answers});Ext.getCmp("Chart1")._axes[0]._minimum=0;Ext.getCmp("Chart1")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.contents.activeUsers)+5;Ext.getCmp("Chart2")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.contents.openSessions)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart2")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.contents.openSessions)+10;Ext.getCmp("Chart3")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.contents.closedSessions)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart3")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.contents.closedSessions)+10;Ext.getCmp("Chart4")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.contents.questions)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart4")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.contents.questions)+10;Ext.getCmp("Chart5")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.contents.answers)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart5")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.contents.answers)+10;Ext.getStore("ARSnovaVis").setData(data);Ext.getStore("ARSnovaVis").load();$("#data1").text(a.contents.activeUsers);$("#data2").text(a.contents.openSessions);$("#data3").text(a.contents.closedSessions);$("#data4").text(a.contents.questions);$("#data5").text(a.contents.answers);$("#data1").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data2").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data3").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data4").animate({height:"toggle"});$("#data5").animate({height:"toggle"})}})}}Ext.define("dashboard.store.ARSnovaVis
